lead_paragraph: Michy Batshuayi will be ready to grab his chance if selected to replace the suspended Diego Costa for Chelsea's Boxing Day clash with Bournemouth in the Premier League, said midfielder Nemanja Matic.

headline.print_headline: Matic Backs Batshuayi to Fill In for Costa
headline.main: Matic Backs Batshuayi to Fill In for Costa

snippet: Michy Batshuayi will be ready to grab his chance if selected to replace the suspended Diego Costa for Chelsea's Boxing Day clash with Bournemouth in the Premier League, said midfielder Nemanja Matic....
